name: Artificial Intelligence with Machine Learning Workshop
organization: Remark Skill Education in association with Thomso, IIT Roorkee
description: Gained hands-on experience in core concepts of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, and explored real-world applications under expert guidance at IIT Roorkee.

name: 402 - Information Technology (NSQF Level - 2)
description: Acquired foundational IT skills including basic programming, digital documentation, spreadsheet handling, and cyber safety as per NSQF Level 2 standards.

name: AI Tools and ChatGPT Workshop
description: Successfully completed training on advanced AI tools and ChatGPT applications. Demonstrated the ability to rapidly create presentations, analyze datasets, and perform debugging tasks using AI-driven automation.
